thread.title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Indian Wells Masters Men's Singles Results

title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Indian Wells Masters Men's Singles Results

organizations.name: wells masters men's singles results reuters

text: March 16, 2018 / 2:20 AM / Updated 16 hours ago ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Indian Wells Masters Men's Singles Results Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Mar 16 (OPTA) - Results from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Indian Wells Masters Men's Singles matches on Thursday .. 4th Round .. 18-Sam Querrey (USA) beat 28-Feliciano Lopez (ESP) 6-3 6-4 32-Milos Raonic (CAN) beat Marcos Baghdatis (CYP) (Walkover) 6-Juan Martin del Potro beat Leonardo Mayer (ARG) 3-6 7-6(2) 6-3 (ARG) .. Quarter-final .. Borna Coric (CRO) beat 7-Kevin Anderson (RSA) 2-6 6-4 7-6(3)
